pull.title: Use list initialization (C++11) for maps/vectors instead of boost::assign::map_list_of/list_of
pull.body: Use list initialization (C++11) for maps/vectors instead of `boost::assign::map_list_of`/`list_of`.

events.message: Use list initialization (C++11) for maps/vectors instead of boost::assign::map_list_of/list_of

events.body: @MarcoFalke Ah, that one seems to tackle a subset of the `map_list_of`/`list_of`:s found in one specific file (`src/chainparams.cpp`). This PR fixes the entire code base.
utACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10545/commits/3fb81a8480582d96e8c87ef1b963a11c55064d57, looks a lot better like this (checked that all values stay the same).
